2023 Cinequest Official FINALIST and LA Film Awards WINNER for VR, The Talent Stealer™ is a spectacular 30min Sci-Fi Action-Thriller presented in the new Immersive Cinema Format (8K 180VR-3D): 

CHAPTER I - At a secret facility called The Maxstein Institute, a group of students are controlled and trained to master their special memory-stealing abilities by a shadowy organization with morally ambiguous goals. One student is singled out for her extraordinary power, and finds herself in a fight for her freedom and her sanity from those that wish to control her.

Combining elements of traditional 2D Cinema with the new 3D-180 Immersive Video format,  viewers can feel like they have truly "stepped inside" a Hollywood movie for the very first time... experiencing Cinema standards of Lighting, Music, VFX and Editing that reach new heights in VR film storytelling.

The Talent Stealer is the first Chapter in a series of film Chapters coming soon to VR (further Trailer included!).

*SPATIAL AUDIO SOUNDTRACK UPDATE COMING SOON!*
